feed.title: Immich Android TV Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich Android TV: 3.7.0
entry.content:
3.7.0 Add FileName, FilePath + Camera to MetaData options Add sorting and filtering (by content type, image/video) in all views. Select "right" on the most right asset in the viewer to toggle a popup with the settings.

3.6.2 Fix album name not showing in view mode.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/giejay/Immich-Android-TV/compare/3.6.1...3.7.0

entry.title: New release for Immich Android TV: 3.8.0
entry.content:
Being able to fast forward through photos by pressing the fast forward button on the remote Bug fix: App not showing on app list of MiBox. #133

Full Changelog: https://github.com/giejay/Immich-Android-TV/compare/3.7.0...3.8.0

entry.title: New release for Immich Android TV: 3.8.1
entry.content: Fix metadata being reversed for Portrait merged images

entry.title: New release for Immich Android TV:
entry.content: Improve fetching of assets with filter enabled Fix metadata being reversed for Portrait merged images Fix needing to click forward twice when showing a portrait image Being able to fast forward through photos by pressing the fast forward button on the remote App not showing on app list of MiBox.

entry.title: New release for Immich Android TV:
entry.content: Fix duplicate albums being shown in the album viewer Fix app closing itself when Projectivity Launcher is being used
